timeline.message: Give command for login (same as MySQL)

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/master' into MariaDBConnectivity

# Conflicts:
#	test/src/main/resources/DeploymentSpecifics.properties

timeline.bodyText:
Would it be possible to let MariaDbDbmsSupport to extend MySqlDbmsSupport instead of GenericDbmsSupport?
--> please don't bother, this change will be made later.
timeline.author: gvanbrakel
